title: Where do I apply for a server?
body: Don't you apply for a pbe server right now?

replies.body: Thanks for the backup LastShadow! Currently [**PBE Signups**](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe) are closed for maintenance, but you can be sure to know when they're open again by checking out the [**news page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news) periodically.
Currently you can't sign up for the PBE since that part of the website is under maintenance for a while.
